You can use this annotation to tag the request stream handler for providing supported application-ids and your custom speechlet.

AlexaSpeechlet - Class in io.klerch.alexa.tellask.model

AlexaSpeechletResponse - Class in io.klerch.alexa.tellask.model

AlexaSpeechletResponse(AlexaOutput) - Constructor for class io.klerch.alexa.tellask.model.AlexaSpeechletResponse
A speechlet response is generated from an AlexaOutput object which should contain all the information necessary to get access to a set of utterances (over the utterance reader) from which it picks randomly according to the intent name also given by the AlexaOutput.

U

UtteranceReader - Interface in io.klerch.alexa.tellask.schema
The utterance reader is an interface for implementations to encapsulate logic of reading a set of utterances from a source (like a file).
